The video was posted on December 6: 2020, on Facebook and has been viewed 91,000 times.
The video: s Indonesian-language caption translates to English as a recitation of holy verses of the Koran by a native Papuan mountain boy from Walesi district, Wamena, Papua province.
The video was also posted on YouTube by: Tribun Timur, on December 12, 2020, and has been viewed more than 585,000 times.
